item.title: Discuz - 安装 - 优化
item.description: 1 - Install Docker & Mysql 5.7 创建Mysql数据库 {PWD} 修改成实际密码 CREATE DATABASE discuz; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON discuz.* TO 'discuz'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '{PWD}'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES; 2 - Pull the Discuz Docker Image 注意设置Docker Sock5代理 需要访问 hub.docker.com 国内很多镜像网站下载失败，腾讯云服务器可直接获取 docker pull tencentci/discuz:latest 3 - 创建本地磁盘目录 mkdir -p /mnt/discuz/www 4 - 创建文件 docker-compose.yaml version: '3' services: web: image: tencentci/discuz:latest container_name: discuz ports: - "28080:80" volumes: - discuz-www:/var/www/html restart: always volumes: discuz-www: driver: local driver_opts: type: none o: bind device: /mnt/discuz/www 通过命令 检查Docker Volumn
